Package arcade.env.lat

Class EnvLattice

java.lang.Object
arcade.env.lat.EnvLattice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Lattice
Direct Known Subclasses:
TriEnvLat
public abstract class EnvLattice
extends java.lang.Object
implements Lattice
Implementation of Lattice using for loop array iteration.

Methods are written to work regardless of underlying geometry. Two Component types are defined:

  • Diffuser for diffusion of molecules on the array
  • Generator for adding concentrations into the array
Since:
2.2
Version:
2.3.8
